trans-unit.source: An activity that receives a message as part of a request/reply message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: 将消息作为请求/答复消息交换模式的一部分接收的活动。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> 活动。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity is created and added to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>.
trans-unit.target: 将创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> 活动并将它添加到 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity is then added to the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> to receive the reply from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity.
trans-unit.target: 然后，会向 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> 添加 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> 活动，以便从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> 活动接收答复。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the action header of the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息的操作标头的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content received by the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> activity
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> 活动接收的内容。

trans-unit.source: The content can be one of the following types: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>.
trans-unit.target: 内容可以为以下类型之一：<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> when receiving a message <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> or a message contract type.
trans-unit.target: 接收消息 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> 或消息协定类型时，使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> when receiving data contract types.
trans-unit.target: 接收数据协定类型时，使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of correlation initializers.
trans-unit.target: 获取相关初始值设定项的集合。
相关初始值设定项的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> activity paired with this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对与此 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> 活动配对的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply" /> 活动的引用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activities are used together to model a request/response message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> 活动配合使用，可对请求/响应消息交换模式进行建模。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity is paired with.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> 活动与哪个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> 活动配对。
